T02D1955:81a-1: ga na tsa kra di dh'i n'a ma /
T02D1955:81a-3: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1955:81a-4: rje btsun mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1955:81a-5: bsod nams khyad par bsags pa dang//
T02D1955:81a-6: dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba dang //
T02D1955:81a-7: bgegs rnams nye bar zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D1955:81a-8: bdag gi tshogs 'khor bshad par bya //
T02D1955:81a-9: yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs su //
T02D1955:81a-10: tshogs kyi khang pa yid 'ong ba //
T02D1955:81a-11: 'khor khang rim gsum ran par brtsig / de nas tsandan gur gum dang //
T02D1955:81a-12: dri yi tshogs ni bsgos nas kyang /
T02D1955:81a-13: sa gzhi bzang po legs byas te //
T02D1955:81a-14: rnam lngas skyong nul byas nas kyang //
T02D1955:81a-15: gzhung dang mthun pa'i mandala la //
T02D1955:81a-16: mdzes pa'i me tog legs brkam sta //
T02D1955:81a-17: mchod pa'i tshogs rnams tshang bar bsag /'byor pa'i yo byad ldan pa dang //
T02D1955:81a-19: ma lus par ni bsdus nas kyang //
T02D1955:81a-20: slob dpon la ni zhu ba dbul //
T02D1955:81a-21: las kyi bum pa byin brlabs nas //
T02D1955:81a-22: mchod pa'i bum pa bsags nas kyang //
T02D1955:81a-23: mdzes pa'i me tog legs btang ste //
T02D1955:81a-24: tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02D1955:81a-25: khro bo sngon po mdzes pa che //
T02D1955:81a-26: khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong //
T02D1955:81a-27: nor bu rin chen ches bcing ba'i //
T02D1955:81a-28: dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste //
T02D1955:81a-29: bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir //
T02D1955:81a-30: dpa' bos gang gis gtong du gsol //
T02D1955:81a-31: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su //
T02D1955:81a-32: bzang po'i sgo ni rnam par dbye //
T02D1955:81a-33: gsol ba btab na nang bkug ste /
T02D1955:81a-34: las kyi bum pas chu gtor te /
T02D1955:81a-35: mna' chu blud la gral la dgod //
T02D1955:81a-36: de nas rdo rje slob dpon la //
T02D1955:81a-37: ma tog phul te gsol ba gdab //
T02D1955:81a-38: de nas rnal 'byor pho mo la //
T02D1955:81a-39: me tog gtor la bskul bar bya //
T02D1955:81a-40: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02D1955:81a-41: lhar bsgom lce lag byin gyis brlab //
T02D1955:81a-42: phyag rgya byin brlab mngon rtogs brjod //
T02D1955:81a-44: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1955:81b-0: @81b rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshags //
T02D1955:81b-1: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1955:81b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po'i gtso //
T02D1955:81b-5: srid pa rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1955:81b-6: ngo bo nyid kyis gdod nas dag / rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02D1955:81b-7: srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed //
T02D1955:81b-8: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um phat /
T02D1955:81b-10: de nas mchod pa'i khyad par tshogs //
T02D1955:81b-11: de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs la //
T02D1955:81b-12: snying ga'i sa bon 'phros pa yis //
T02D1955:81b-13: bla ma rje btsun mdun bsams te //
T02D1955:81b-14: mchod yon zhal bsil zhabs bkru dbul //
T02D1955:81b-15: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rab mchod nas //
T02D1955:81b-16: da kho na nyid bstod pa bya //
T02D1955:81b-17: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um phat /
T02D1955:81b-18: aom ma h'a badzra pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1955:81b-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1955:81b-27: rdo rje dril bu ldan pa yis //
T02D1955:81b-28: gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod //
T02D1955:81b-29: gshin rje gshed po shin tu 'jigs //
T02D1955:81b-30: ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
T02D1955:81b-32: gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa //
T02D1955:81b-33: nga rgyal rdo rje ngo bo khyod //
T02D1955:81b-34: rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa //
T02D1955:81b-35: rin chen rdo rje ngo bo nyid //
T02D1955:81b-36: 'dod chags rdo rje gtso bo khyod //
T02D1955:81b-37: 'dod chags chos kyi rnam pa bsnyems //
T02D1955:81b-38: thams cad dbyangs ni mchog gi mchog / rdo rje gsung mchog phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1955:81b-39: phrag dog rdo rje ngo bo khyod //
T02D1955:81b-40: gshin rje gshed po las kun byed //
T02D1955:81b-41: sku yi rdo rje rab 'dra ba //
T02D1955:81b-42: ral gri phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1955:81b-43: sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po khyod //
T02D1955:81b-44: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus //
T02D1955:81b-45: sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso //
T02D1955:81b-47: bdag gi nyon mongs tshogs rnams las //
T02D1955:81b-48: byung ba'i sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ni //
T02D1955:81b-49: rje btsun 'jam dbyangs spyan snga ru //
T02D1955:81b-50: de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02D1955:81b-51: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang ni //
T02D1955:81b-52: byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun mchog //
T02D1955:81b-53: slob sogs dge ba thams cad la //
T02D1955:81b-54: rgya cher bdag ni rjes yi rang //
T02D1955:81b-55: khams gsum rnam rtog dra ba yis //
T02D1955:81b-56: mngon par gtibs pa mun nag la //
T02D1955:81b-57: theg pa chen po'i ye shes che //
T02D1955:81b-58: chos kyi sgron mes 'od snang mdzod //
T02D1955:81b-59: rdzogs sangs 'khor ba'i chos rnams las //
T02D1955:81b-60: chos skur mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa //
T02D1955:82a-2: sems can don mdzad bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1955:82a-3: bsod nams tshogs las mngon byung ba'i //
T02D1955:82a-4: dge ba'i bsod nams ma lus kun //
T02D1955:82a-5: sems can 'khor ba las sgrol phyir //
T02D1955:82a-6: thams cad byang chub mchog tu bsngo //
T02D1955:82a-7: mchod pa nyi shu'i tshogs rnams kyang de sogs rol mo'i tshogs rnams ni //
T02D1955:82a-9: rdo rje chen po mchod byas la //
T02D1955:82a-10: de nas blo yis gshegs su gsol //
T02D1955:82a-11: de nas stong pa nyid bsgoms te //
T02D1955:82a-12: snying rjes byin pa'i gsal bar bya //
T02D1955:82a-13: de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D1955:82a-14: rdo rje sa gzhir ba dang //
T02D1955:82a-15: 'bar ba'i khang pa drag po la //
T02D1955:82a-16: mtshon cha tshogs kyis spras par bsam //
T02D1955:82a-17: nang du chos 'byung dkar po ni //
T02D1955:82a-18: gru gsum mtshon pa dang bcas pa //
T02D1955:82a-19: rdo rje gzhal yas khang bskyed la //
T02D1955:82a-20: rnal 'byor bzhi yi tshul dag gis //
T02D1955:82a-21: de nyid dkyil 'khor smin par bya //
T02D1955:82a-22: de nas bdud rtsi byin brlabs te //
T02D1955:82a-23: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin mchod //
T02D1955:82a-24: de nas mthe bong srin lag gis //
T02D1955:82a-25: blangs pa'i bdud rtsi byugs pa yis //
T02D1955:82a-26: chos 'byung gru gsum dkar dmar bri //
T02D1955:82a-27: de nas bdud rtsi'i thig le yis //
T02D1955:82a-28: mdzes pa'i me tog legs bkram ste //
T02D1955:82a-29: skad cig bskyed dang dgug gzhug bya //
T02D1955:82a-30: de nas bdud rtsi phul nas kyang //
T02D1955:82a-31: bdag nyid la ni mchod par bya //
T02D1955:82a-32: thabs dang gsang bas blangs nas kyang //
T02D1955:82a-33: lce rtse smin mtshams spyi bor gtor //
T02D1955:82a-34: de nas de dag mi dmigs bsgom //
T02D1955:82a-35: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid la ni //
T02D1955:82a-36: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod nas kyang //
T02D1955:82a-37: bstod cing bdud rtsi myangs nas kyang //
T02D1955:82a-38: gsal bar dmigs nas bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1955:82a-39: de nas zhing skyong 'khor bcas la //
T02D1955:82a-40: gtor ma rgya chen btang ba ni //
T02D1955:82a-41: yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo yis //
T02D1955:82a-42: bsregs dang sbyangs dang gtor byas la //
T02D1955:82a-44: thig le le tse dgu byas te //
T02D1955:82a-45: dbus la ye shes 'khor lo bsam //
T02D1955:82a-46: phyogs dang mtshams la zhing skyong brgyad //
T02D1955:82a-47: ma ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T02D1955:82a-48: bcas pa spyan drangs mchod pa bya //
T02D1955:82a-50: shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang //
T02D1955:82a-51: ri bo dang ni ri sul phug / grod dang bzhi mdo deg [?] dang ni //
T02D1955:82a-52: khyad par du ni khang stong dang //
T02D1955:82a-53: gdol pa'i snod dang thang dang ni //
T02D1955:82b-0: @82b khyad par du ni chu la gnas //
T02D1955:82b-1: nag pa drag po drag po che //
T02D1955:82b-2: lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang //
T02D1955:82b-3: nag po gtsigs dang mi sdug drag / rgya las 'das dang log 'dren rnams //
T02D1955:82b-4: rgyan byad mo dang drag mo dang //
T02D1955:82b-5: mi sdug ma dang au ma dang //
T02D1955:82b-6: rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ma dang //
T02D1955:82b-7: mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma //
T02D1955:82b-8: nag mo bzang mo nag chen po //
T02D1955:82b-9: nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1955:82b-10: dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo //
T02D1955:82b-11: drag tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo //
T02D1955:82b-12: 'phrog byad ma dang mar me ma //
T02D1955:82b-14: drag po'i gzugs dang drag chen mo //
T02D1955:82b-15: mche ba gtsigs pa'i thod chen mo //
T02D1955:82b-16: thod phreng phreng can kha tv'am ma ;
T02D1955:82b-17: / sprul chen ral gri dgra sta can //
T02D1955:82b-18: rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma //
T02D1955:82b-19: de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1955:82b-20: las kun rjes su grub byed ma //
T02D1955:82b-21: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen mo //
T02D1955:82b-22: de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso //
T02D1955:82b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku che ste //
T02D1955:82b-25: rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis //
T02D1955:82b-26: thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig / aom kakka dh'a na /
T02D1955:82b-31: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02D1955:82b-34: padma'i gdan la gnas par bsams la /
T02D1955:82b-35: mchod pa lngar byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid dbul te //
T02D1955:82b-36: sngags de nyid kyi mjug la /
T02D1955:82b-37: aa mu ka s+ya sh'anti dku ru h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1955:82b-39: so so'i lce la h'um las rdo rjer byin gyis
T02D1955:82b-40: brlabs par bsams pa'i sbu gu'i 'od kyis drangs te
T02D1955:82b-43: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1955:82b-44: dag cing gsal zhes bya ba brjod nas /
T02D1955:82b-46: sems can thams cad sdig med cing //
T02D1955:82b-47: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig / gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yi //
T02D1955:82b-48: sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog / ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang //
T02D1955:82b-49: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02D1955:82b-50: da lta nyid du rjes brtse bas //
T02D1955:82b-51: rnal 'byor bstan bcos gnas la dgod //
T02D1955:82b-52: ces bya bas bsngo bar byas gshegs su mi gsol /
T02D1955:82b-53: de nas rnal 'byor pho mo kun lha'i dkyil 'khor du bltas la /
T02D1955:83a-1: dang bdug pa dang mar me dang /
T02D1955:83a-2: lha bshos kyi tshul bzhin du mchod la /
T02D1955:83a-3: de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i chang gis mchod de /
T02D1955:83a-4: lag pa g-yon pas chad bzung nas //
T02D1955:83a-5: g-yas pas rtse gsum pa byas la //
T02D1955:83a-6: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis sbyin te //
T02D1955:83a-7: ltos shig mdzes pa dam pa'i chos //
T02D1955:83a-8: 'di la the tshom yod ma yin //
T02D1955:83a-9: bram ze khyi dang gdol pa gsum //
T02D1955:83a-10: rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs par bza' //
T02D1955:83a-13: 'dod chags dri ma bral ba yi //
T02D1955:83a-14: rin thang med las legs 'ongs chos //
T02D1955:83a-15: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02D1955:83a-16: de kho na nyid bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1955:83a-17: zhes pas padma'i bskor ba dang bcas pas blang ngo //
T02D1955:83a-18: 'og ma rnams la drang ba la 'di skad brjod //
T02D1955:83a-19: sbyor ba'i dus na dngos grub ni //
T02D1955:83a-20: spyod kun de nyid de bzhin du //
T02D1955:83a-21: rnal 'byor pas ni kun du spyad //
T02D1955:83a-22: ji ltar bde bar spyad par bya //
T02D1955:83a-23: zhes bya ba brjod la brim mo //
T02D1955:83a-24: de'i 'og tu sha khu dang gur mar gyis mchod //
T02D1955:83a-25: de nas lha bshos so sor drangs la /
T02D1955:83a-26: de nas kun gyis phud bsdus la /
T02D1955:83a-28: slob dpon gyis cha gnyis su bgos te /
T02D1955:83a-29: cha gcig g-yon gyi phyogs su bgos la byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1955:83a-31: cha gcig g-yas su bzhag la /
T02D1955:83a-32: byin gyis brlabs la phyogs skyong la dbul te /
T02D1955:83a-33: aom aa k'a ro ku kham zhes pa'i sngags kyis mchod /
T02D1955:83a-34: de nas ci bder rol cing longs spyod /
T02D1955:83a-36: de nyid yang dag spyod pa yi //
T02D1955:83a-37: rnal 'byor pa ni kun nas bdag / ji ltar bde bar brjod par bya //
T02D1955:83a-38: sgyu ma lta bur mdzes pa yis //
T02D1955:83a-39: gnyis sprod kun 'khyud sogs sbyong ba //
T02D1955:83a-40: lus can don du yang dag spyad //
T02D1955:83a-41: dngos po bral la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1955:83a-42: de nas lha dang phyogs skyong la gnang ba nod pa dang //
T02D1955:83a-43: badzra satvas bzod par gsol ba byas te /
T02D1955:83a-44: badzra mu: zhes pas gshegs su gsol /
T02D1955:83a-45: dam tshig gi lha snying gar bsdus la /
T02D1955:83a-46: aom padma ko shi h'um zhes bsdu'o //
T02D1955:83a-47: aom badzra dhu pe grihna gtstsha h'um /
T02D1955:83b-0: zhes bya bas phyi rol gyi lha gshegs @83b su gsol lo //
T02D1955:83b-1: de nas lhag ma bsdus te /
T02D1955:83b-3: rnal 'byor pho mo'i lhag ma ni phyi rol gyi
T02D1955:83b-4: sha za la sogs pa mi ma yin pa rnams
T02D1955:83b-5: la btang ste / phyi sgor bton la btang ngo //
T02D1955:83b-6: khyim pa'i lhag ma ni khyim pa de nyid kyi mi ma yin pa la bsngo'o //
T02D1955:83b-7: lhag ma de lta bu'i skal pa med pa la /
T02D1955:83b-8: slob dpon gyi kha nas bdud rtsir byas la sbyin no //
T02D1955:83b-9: de nas yon bdag dang 'khor la bkra shis dang smon lam gdab po //
T02D1955:83b-10: de nas gtor skyel de log pa dang /
T02D1955:83b-11: tshogs kyi khang sgor me long dang dung bud pa dkrol chu can gyi zan ni mchod /
T02D1955:83b-12: de nas nang du log nas rnal 'byor pho mo la yang de bzhin mchod pa bya'o //
T02D1955:83b-13: ma 'ongs skye bo'i tshogs rnams bsags par 'dod pa dang //
T02D1955:83b-14: bslab pa'i lam la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1955:83b-15: don du dri med lung dang bla ma'i man ngag ltar //
T02D1955:83b-16: ma nor bzung ste bdag dang gzhan la phan phyir bris pa yin //
